column2: I cleared the Nightmare Court out of Beldame's Rise.
<c=@abilitytype>Mark.</c> Inscribe a mark that bleeds foes when they trigger it, and grants regeneration to allies.
Lunge at your foe and strike them with your sword.
Call in the Pact Fleet for some air support to finish off your foes.
Clear caravan routes, unite dissenters, assist short-handed patrols, and reduce Risen numbers.
Thanks to you, the Pact camp is operating much better.
Create a field of crystal shards that explode and damage foes.
Acquire a mining suit from Rebel Isaak, and follow Isaak's instructions to inspire local dredge rebels.
You've strengthened the dredge revolution. Good job!
15e: Sweeping attack that hits multiple foes. YY-ZZ damage. (Full Damage: 3 targets)
Retreat backward, leaving a blinding trail in your wake.
Focus on a target for increased damage.
<c=@abilitytype>Trap.</c> Set a trap that chills foes.
The number of kegs you've stolen.
Fire 5 slow-moving shots at your foe. Uses 1 ammunition charge.
Able to shadowstep to original location.
Dodging has a chance to heal allies.
You create a symbol courage at your location when you reach 50%% health.
Your spirit weapons now burn when they attack.
Your spirit weapons now burn when they attack.
End the transformation and return to your true form
<c=@abilitytype>Burst.</c> Jump to the targeted location and slam your hammer down, damaging and stunning foes.
<c=@abilitytype>Burst.</c> Immobilize your foes with a flurry of bleeding strikes. Effect increases with adrenaline level.
<c=@abilitytype>Burst.</c> Stun your foe with a skull crack. Effect increases with adrenaline level.
<c=@abilitytype>Burst.</c> Leap at your foe with a devastating attack. Effect increases with adrenaline level. Gain might if this attack hits.
To return to PvE (Tyria), click on the PvP button in the upper-left corner and select Leave the Mists.""
Fire your arrow cart at the target area. Arrows that hit cripple the target.
Fire your arrow cart at the target area. Arrows that hit bleed the target.
<c=@abilitytype>Burst.</c> Fire a forceful shot. Damage increases with adrenaline level.
<c=@abilitytype>Banner.</c> Place a banner that increases toughness and vitality for you and nearby allies. Picking up the banner reduces the recharge of this skill.
Fire your arrow cart at the target area. Arrows that hit cripple the target.
Hold down to power up the catapult and fire it.
Hold down to power up the catapult and fire it.
Hold down to power up the catapult and fire it.
Vent fire all around the ram, burning foes.
Launch a barrage of rounds that push back foes where they land.
Obtained from lost bandit chests in the Silverwastes. Extra pieces can be purchased with bandit crests once a boot requisition order is obtained.
Obtained by completing Point of No Return." Extra pieces can be purchased for bandit crests."
Obtained by defeating the Mordrem Vinewrath in the Silverwastes.
